snippet: Trailing by 4-1 in the third period, the Islanders tied the Flyers with 28 seconds to go only to lose on a score by Brayden Schenn with 2.1 seconds to go.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Philadelphia Flyers beat New York Islanders, 5-4, denying them opportunity to clinch playoff berth; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: Trailing by 4-1 in the third period, the Islanders tied the Flyers with 28 seconds to go only to lose on a score by Brayden Schenn with 2.1 seconds to go.

headline.print_headline: Islanders’ Bid to Clinch Playoff Spot Is Foiled
headline.main: Islanders’ Bid to Clinch Playoff Spot Is Foiled by Flyers
